BLL

Class ContentEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • BLL.ContentEvent

  • public class ContentEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    ContentManager tree update event argument object passed with details of the event used to notify ContentTree of tree ADDs, DELETEs, UPDATE's & MOVEs

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ADD 
      static int DELETE

      static int UPDATE

            MediaItem child,

        Sets the event parameters at creation
        Parameters:
        parent - parent object - used in an ADD
        child - child object - used in ADD, DELETE, UPDATE & MOVE
        action - the action to be preformed
